00112 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00113 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
00114 {
00115        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00116 
00117        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00118        I_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
00119 
00120        istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
00121 
00122        int count = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00123        objectPtr->Clear();
00124 
00125        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00126               double x = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_X)->text().toDouble();
00127               double y = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_Y)->text().toDouble();
00128        
00129               objectPtr->InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
00130        }
00131 }

00143 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00144 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
00145 {
00146        iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00147 
00148        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00149        if (row < 0){
00150               row = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
00151               
00152               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
00153        }
00154        else{
00155               NodeParamsTable->insertRow(row);
00156        }
00157 
00158        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_X, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00159        NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_Y, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
00160        NodeParamsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
00161 
00162        DoUpdateModel();
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00167 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
00168 {
00169        int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
00170        if (row >= 0){
00171               iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
00172 
00173               NodeParamsTable->removeRow(row);
00174 
00175               DoUpdateModel();
00176        }
00177 }

00200 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00201 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
00202 {
00203        I_ASSERT(IsGuiCreated());
00204 
00205        i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
00206        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00207               NodeParamsTable->clearContents();
00208 
00209               int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
00210               NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(count);
00211 
00212               for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
00213                      i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
00214                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
00215                      NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
00216               }
00217        }
00218 }

00223 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
00224 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiCreated()
00225 {
00226        BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
00227 
00228        NodeParamsTable->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
00229 
00230        CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate* columnDelegate = new CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate();
00231        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
00232        NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
00233 }
